questions.question: A sells a watch to B at a profit of 20% and B sells it to C at a profit of 25%. If C pays Rs. 1500, what did A pay?
The average of 9 numbers is 50. If one number is excluded, the average becomes 48. What is the excluded number?
An item is marked at Rs. 8000 and sold at Rs. 6840 after two successive discounts. If the first discount is 10%, what is the second?
A can complete a job in 18 days, and B in 24 days. If they work together for 4 days, what fraction of the work remains?
A person borrows Rs. 5000 at 12% p.a. compound interest. What amount will he repay after 3 years?
The population of a town increased by 10%, then decreased by 10%. What is the net percentage change?
A boat goes 30 km downstream in 2 hours and comes back in 3 hours. What is the speed of the boat in still water?
If 12 men or 18 women can do a job in 20 days, how long will 8 men and 12 women take to finish it?
The ratio of incomes of A and B is 5:3 and their expenditures are in the ratio 9:5. If both save Rs. 1000, what is A's income?
The marked price of an article is Rs. 2500. It is sold at Rs. 2125. Find the discount percentage.
The simple interest on Rs. 4000 at 5% per annum for x years is Rs. 1000. Find x.
A can do a piece of work in 12 days, B in 15 days. If they work on alternate days starting with A, how long will the work take?
What is the compound interest on Rs. 16000 in 2 years at 10% per annum compounded annually?
Find the least number which when divided by 5, 6, and 8 leaves a remainder of 3 in each case.
A mixture contains milk and water in the ratio 5:1. How much water must be added to 30 liters to make the ratio 5:2?
A pipe can fill a tank in 12 hours, and another can empty it in 20 hours. If both are open, how long will it take to fill the tank?
Find the next number: 2, 5, 10, 17, 26, ?
In a family of six persons A, B, C, D, E, and F, there are two married couples. A is a doctor and father of E. F is the grandfather of E. What is B’s relation to F?
Pointing to a girl, Raj said, ‘She is the only daughter of my father’s only daughter.’ How is the girl related to Raj?
If MEAT is coded as 135120, then TEAM is coded as?
Which number replaces the question mark? 13, 17, 19, 23, 29, ?, 37
What comes next: BDF, CFI, DHL, ?
If MANGO is coded as NZOHQ, how is PEACH coded?

Syllogism: 
All poets are writers. 
Some writers are critics. 

Conclusion: 
I. Some poets are critics. 
II. All critics are writers.

Reading Comprehension:
	 ‘Electric cars are seen as a green solution to transport, reducing reliance on fossil fuels.’
 What is a likely reason for their promotion?

Passage:
	 ‘Remote working has changed the way companies operate, providing flexibility and reducing commute stress.
 What is a downside?

Comprehension:
	 ‘Nutrition labels help consumers make informed food choices.’
 What is the author’s likely intent?

Reading Comprehension:
	 ‘Space exploration inspires innovation and expands human knowledge.’
 What is NOT an implication?
Find the missing number in the pattern: 8, 27, 64, 125, ?, 343
